content: this is a free crochet video tutorial for making this beautiful rose all parts for making the flower are explained step by step for the rose in the photos i have used * cotton blend yarn yarnart jeans * hook size 2 75mm / c * bamboo stick for the stem * thin wire for the leaves optional * needle for sewing the tails on the back of the worked pieces * glue gun for putting all parts together enjoy slightly_smiling_face
